description: Starts with the Toei Animation 50th anniversary logo followed by footage of the Yokohama Bay Bridge looking towards Yokohama Marine Tower, where explosions appear after a few seconds. Masaru introduces himself and explains that Digimon are creatures from the Digital World with unprecedented abilities that are now running amok. While Agumon, Lalamon, Gaomon, Tohma and Yoshino are introduced on screen, he continues that this is no problem because he will fight evil Digimon together with his friends. As he explains about DigiSoul, Tohma, Yoshino and then Masaru use their Digivices. Agumon evolves to GeoGreymon, and after the evolution scene and a named attack, Masaru tells when the series starts airing, as the screen shows the series logo.
